transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Arun sir se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sandhya baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART ke office se senior manager.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Actually aapka call aaya hua hai IndiaMART par.
Haan.
Executive: To aap mujhe batayenge sir kya problem aa raha hai service se related?
Customer: Service related koi lead nahi aata hai aur jo lead aata hai by lead mein aapko contact number bhejta hai woh contact number mein jab contact karta hai koi alag se koi number nahi aata hai wahi hai problem IndiaMART release karega.
Executive: IndiaMART release karega.
Executive: Matlab visit karenge?
Customer: IndiaMART se release karega main.
Executive: Head office mein aap aayenge sir IndiaMART ke Noida mein?
Customer: Nahi nahi main aa sakta hai main Kolkata ka aadmi hai.
Executive: Kolkata ke branch mein jaoge aap?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aap mujhe ek minute rukiye to sir aap mujhe ek baar discussion karna tha service se related.
Haan.
Executive: Jaise aap bol rahe ho lead nahi aa rahi hai kya problem hai matlab product related problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Abhi bol raha hai aisa hi hai ja hum hota hai hamara area chota hai Kolkata North 24 Parganas South 24 Parganas iske andar jo business hoga hoga uske bahar mein koi business nahi hoga.
Executive: Sirf aap local mein deal karte ho Kolkata mein?
Customer: Kolkata mein North 24 Parganas South 24 Parganas mein lekin har time nahi bolta hai lekin aap logo ko koi deal nahi aata hai.
Executive: To aap ek kaam karenge sir ek baar aap online video meeting pe aa sakte ho main aapko ek baar dekh leti hu contact detail to sir dekho har ek by lead mein show karta hai.
Customer: Thik hai 10 baje kal phone kariye hum dekhega.
Executive: Thik hai kal 10 baje.
Customer: Abhi dijiye.
Customer: Abhi dijiye 10 baje kal phone kariye.
Executive: Thik hai main aapko karti hu sir kal 10 baje call thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir shukriya.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads are generated.

- Contact number is not correct.

- Wants to release from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to join a video meeting.

- Executive will call back tomorrow at 10 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow at 10 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, video meeting
